mosinstall.name: BSQ Sitestats
mosinstall.author: Brent Stolle
mosinstall.license: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License
mosinstall.description: This module does a tabular report based on sitestats generated with the BSQ Sitestats component.

param.name: reportname
param.label: Report to Show
param.description: Which report should we show for this module instance?
param.option: Average Hits Per Visitor Over Time

param.name: cachetime
param.label: Cache Timeout
param.description: After how many seconds should we consider this cache expired? 0 means do not cache.

param.name: limit
param.label: Row Limit
param.description: Maximum number of rows to display for tabular stats

param.name: beforenow
param.label: Before Now
param.description: How many seconds before now does the time window start for time window functions?

param.name: duration
param.label: Duration
param.description: How many seconds wide should the window be for time functions, starting from before now?

param.name: dateformat
param.label: Date Format
param.description: Date format for date and time reports in date() format

param.name: cssprepend
param.label: CSS Class Prepend
param.description: Prefix for all classes used in this module

param.name: showcountandpct
param.label: Show counts and percentages on aggregate reports. Setting this to No will hide these columns
